message: Rule applicable: normalise_associative_commutative ([("Base", 8400)]), to expression: Sum([Sum([a, b]), c]), resulting in: Sum([a, b, c])
Rule applicable: sum_eq_to_sumeq ([("Minion", 4400)]), to expression: (Sum([a, b, c]) = 4), resulting in: SumEq([a, b, c], 4)
Rule applicable: sumeq_to_minion ([("Minion", 4400)]), to expression: SumEq([a, b, c], 4), resulting in: And([SumGeq([a, b, c], 4), SumLeq([a, b, c], 4)])

Rule applicable: normalise_associative_commutative ([("Base", 8400)]), to expression: And([And([SumGeq([a, b, c], 4), SumLeq([a, b, c], 4)]), (a >= b)]), resulting in: And([SumGeq([a, b, c], 4), SumLeq([a, b, c], 4), (a >= b)])
Rule applicable: geq_to_ineq ([("Minion", 4100)]), to expression: (a >= b), resulting in: Ineq(b, a, 0)
